name: @molanojustin/smithsonian-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Smithsonian Open Access collections

scripts.check-version: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const fs=require('fs'); const toml=fs.readFileSync('pyproject.toml','utf8'); const match=toml.match(/^version\s*=\s*\"([^\"]+)\"/m); if(!match||pkg.version!==match[1]){console.error('❌ Version mismatch: package.json='+pkg.version+', pyproject.toml='+(match?match[1]:'not found')); process.exit(1);} console.log('✅ Versions match: '+pkg.version);"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run sync-requirements && npm run check-version && npm test
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const toml=fs.readFileSync('pyproject.toml','utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('pyproject.toml', toml.replace(/^version\s*=\s*\"[^\"]+\"/m, 'version = \"'+pkg.version+'\"')); require('child_process').execSync('uv lock')" && git add pyproject.toml uv.lock && git commit -m "Update pyproject.toml and uv.lock for patch version bump"
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const toml=fs.readFileSync('pyproject.toml','utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('pyproject.toml', toml.replace(/^version\s*=\s*\"[^\"]+\"/m, 'version = \"'+pkg.version+'\"')); require('child_process').execSync('uv lock')" && git add pyproject.toml uv.lock && git commit -m "Update pyproject.toml and uv.lock for minor version bump"
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const toml=fs.readFileSync('pyproject.toml','utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('pyproject.toml', toml.replace(/^version\s*=\s*\"[^\"]+\"/m, 'version = \"'+pkg.version+'\"')); require('child_process').execSync('uv lock')" && git add pyproject.toml uv.lock && git commit -m "Update pyproject.toml and uv.lock for major version bump"
scripts.release: npm run sync-requirements && npm run check-version && npm test && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
